extends.description: Path to configuration file to extend

$schema.description: JSON Schema URI (used by some editors)

MD001.description: MD001/heading-increment/header-increment - Heading levels should only increment by one level at a time

MD002.description: MD002/first-heading-h1/first-header-h1 - First heading should be a top-level heading

MD005.description: MD005/list-indent - Inconsistent indentation for list items at the same level

MD006.description: MD006/ul-start-left - Consider starting bulleted lists at the beginning of the line

start_indented.description: Whether to indent the first level of the list

start_indent.description: Spaces for first level indent (when start_indented is set)

list_item_empty_lines.description: Allow spaces for empty lines in list items

spaces_per_tab.description: Number of spaces for each hard tab

code_block_line_length.description: Number of characters for code blocks

MD014.description: MD014/commands-show-output - Dollar signs used before commands without showing output

MD018.description: MD018/no-missing-space-atx - No space after hash on atx style heading

MD019.description: MD019/no-multiple-space-atx - Multiple spaces after hash on atx style heading

MD020.description: MD020/no-missing-space-closed-atx - No space inside hashes on closed atx style heading

MD021.description: MD021/no-multiple-space-closed-atx - Multiple spaces inside hashes on closed atx style heading

MD022.description: MD022/blanks-around-headings/blanks-around-headers - Headings should be surrounded by blank lines

MD023.description: MD023/heading-start-left/header-start-left - Headings must start at the beginning of the line

MD024.description: MD024/no-duplicate-heading/no-duplicate-header - Multiple headings with the same content

MD025.description: MD025/single-title/single-h1 - Multiple top-level headings in the same document

front_matter_title.description: RegExp for matching title in front matter

MD027.description: MD027/no-multiple-space-blockquote - Multiple spaces after blockquote symbol

ul_single.description: Spaces for single-line unordered list items

ol_single.description: Spaces for single-line ordered list items

ul_multi.description: Spaces for multi-line unordered list items

ol_multi.description: Spaces for multi-line ordered list items

MD031.description: MD031/blanks-around-fences - Fenced code blocks should be surrounded by blank lines

MD032.description: MD032/blanks-around-lists - Lists should be surrounded by blank lines

MD036.description: MD036/no-emphasis-as-heading/no-emphasis-as-header - Emphasis used instead of a heading

MD038.description: MD038/no-space-in-code - Spaces inside code span elements

MD040.description: MD040/fenced-code-language - Fenced code blocks should have a language specified

MD041.description: MD041/first-line-heading/first-line-h1 - First line in a file should be a top-level heading

front_matter_title.description: RegExp for matching title in front matter

MD044.description: MD044/proper-names - Proper names should have the correct capitalization

MD045.description: MD045/no-alt-text - Images should have alternate text (alt text)

MD047.description: MD047/single-trailing-newline - Files should end with a single newline character

MD049.description: MD049/emphasis-style - Emphasis style should be consistent

MD050.description: MD050/strong-style - Strong style should be consistent

MD051.description: MD051/link-fragments - Link fragments should be valid

MD052.description: MD052/reference-links-images - Reference links and images should use a label that is defined

MD053.description: MD053/link-image-reference-definitions - Link and image reference definitions should be needed

bullet.description: bullet - MD004, MD005, MD006, MD007, MD032

whitespace.description: whitespace - MD009, MD010, MD012, MD027, MD028, MD030, MD037, MD038, MD039

links.description: links - MD011, MD034, MD039, MD042, MD051, MD052, MD053

blank_lines.description: blank_lines - MD012, MD022, MD031, MD032, MD047

code.description: code - MD014, MD031, MD038, MD040, MD046, MD048

spaces.description: spaces - MD018, MD019, MD020, MD021, MD023

tests.description: llama-70b generated negative; focus on pattern keyword
tests.python_error:
'Invalid heading' does not match '^(\\*|\\+|#{1,6} .*)$'

Failed validating 'pattern' in schema['properties']['MD043']['properties']['headings']['items']:
    {'type': 'string', 'pattern': '^(\\*|\\+|#{1,6} .*)$'}

On instance['MD043']['headings'][0]:
    'Invalid heading'

tests.description: llama-70b generated negative; focus on type keyword with an array of types
tests.python_error:
'two' is not of type 'integer'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['MD010']['properties']['spaces_per_tab']:
    {'description': 'Number of spaces for each hard tab',
     'type': 'integer',
     'minimum': 0,
     'default': 1}

On instance['MD010']['spaces_per_tab']:
    'two'

tests.description: llama-70b generated negative; focus on additionalProperties keyword with an object schema
tests.rust_error: Additional properties are not allowed ('invalid_property' was unexpected)
tests.python_error:
Additional properties are not allowed ('invalid_property' was unexpected)

Failed validating 'additionalProperties' in schema['properties']['MD002']:
    {'description': 'MD002/first-heading-h1/first-header-h1 - First '
                    'heading should be a top-level heading',
     'type': ['boolean', 'object'],
     'default': True,
     'properties': {'level': {'description': 'Heading level',
                              'type': 'integer',
                              'minimum': 1,
                              'maximum': 6,
                              'default': 1}},
     'additionalProperties': False}

On instance['MD002']:
    {'level': 1, 'invalid_property': True}
